node.name: CTG - System Performance - By Device Reports - (SRM 4.x)

property.description: • Report created or modified by *SS*.
• Report created or modified by *SS*.
• Report created or modified by *SS*.
• Report created or modified by *SS*.

• Report created or modified by *SS*.
• Report created or modified by *SS*.
• Report created or modified by *SS*.

This report provides a heatmap of VMAX FA port utilization. It is s multi-level report and can be drilled into to see details.
NOTE - BLANK/WHITE cells are due to that VMAX not having those corresponding FE Directors installed.
Color of the rectangle - FA Utilization % (matching the heatmap legend)
Click on each FA to drill into see an individual port heat map.

This report provides a heatmap of VMAX FA port utilization. It is s multi-level report and can be drilled into to see details.
Color of the rectangle --> Port Utilization %
Click on each FA port to drill into each port for detailed specifics.

node.name: CplxExp to AccessToInitiatorPort for Passively Discovered Hosts

property.description: List of the director's ports

property.name: Port
property.description: Director and port number.

property.name: WWNN
property.description: World Wide Node Name (only available for front-end ports)

property.name: WWPN
property.description: World wide Port Name (available only for front-end ports if the array is collected though SMI-S)

property.name: Port Status
property.description: Status of the Port.

property.name: Current Utilization (%)
property.description: The Current Utilization of the Director. The percent of time the director is busy.

property.name: Throughput
property.description: The Number of IOs Read and Written by the Director per second.

property.name: Bandwidth
property.description: The amount of data read and written per second.

property.name: Availability (%)
property.description: The availability of the port.

property.filterExpression: name=='ReadRequests' | name=='ReadRequestsMax' | name=='WriteRequests' | name=='WriteRequestsMax' | (name=='IORate' | name=='IORateMax') & !(parttype=='Controller' | parttype=='Storage Group' | parttype=='Disk')

property.description: The number of read and write operations per second.
The number of read operations per second.
The maximum number of read operations per second.
The number of operations per second.
The maximum number of operations per second.
The number of write operations per second.
The maximum number of write operations per second.
The amount of data read and written per second.
The amount of data read and written per second.
The amount of data read and written per second.
The amount of data read per second.
The amount of data written per second.
